name: FInputAxisProperties
doc: Configurable properties for control axes, used to transform raw input into game ready values.

DeadZone: What the dead zone of the axis is.  For control axes such as analog sticks.
Sensitivity: Scaling factor to multiply raw value by.
Exponent: For applying curves to [0..1] axes, e.g. analog sticks
bInvert: Inverts reported values for this axis
